name: Gravity Rush 2 Another Story: The Ark of Time - Raven's Choice
name_original: Gravity Rush 2 Another Story: The Ark of Time - Raven's Choice
description: Gravity Rush 2: Another Story: The Ark of Time - Raven's Choice (also known as Another Story - Raven's Choice or The Ark of Time - Raven's Choice for short) is the substantial story related downloadable content for Gravity Rush 2. It was announced December 3rd, 2016, and later released on March 21, 2017, for free.
